titleStmt.title: The nevv inne. Or, The light heart A comoedy. As it was neuer acted, but most negligently play'd, by some, the Kings Seruants. And more squeamishly beheld, and censured by others, the Kings subiects. 1629. Now, at last, set at liberty to the readers, his Maties seruants, and subiects, to be iudg'd. 1631. By the author, B. Ionson.
titleStmt.author: Jonson, Ben, 1573?-1637.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper, for Thomas Alchorne, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yeard, at the signe of the greene Dragon,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Church-yeard, at the signe of the greene Dragon
